London was plunged into chaos. Prepare for the worst: as predicted, the city fell curse. For the second time in the history of the plague broke out here. Thousands of people are dying, but death - not the worst thing that can happen to a sick ... You're lucky you're still alive. 

But for how long? In the maze of city streets at every turn, and above ground and underground, hiding the terrible creatures that were once people. Monstrous virus changed them beyond recognition, and now living flesh for them - the most coveted prey. Challenge yourself and try to survive in a world ZombiU Ã¢â€žÂ¢ owners will be able to PC, and next-generation consoles. 

Advanced technical capabilities allow you to bring the game Zombi horror genre to a new level. You will be a real test of strength. Do not forget that one mistake can cost too much if you perish, the game will have to start anew.

Features:

"The dangers around a lot, but resources are scarce ... so dispose of them wisely. Who knows when you'll be able to find more ammunition, food or medicine.
"If your hero dies, he turns into a zombie and join the crowd of living dead in the streets. You have to create a new character and start the game from scratch. However, you can try to find the previous character and get back to the old supplies ...

"During the game you will find a variety of tools, first aid kits, maps and more. But it is necessary to weaken vigilance - and this gear will not help you.
"Over the centuries the streets of London have seen a lot, but this is the first time here. Unmanaged Tops zombies are everywhere: in the modern regions and legendary historical quarters, the walls of the Tower of London and Buckingham Palace.

"Inexpressible atmosphere of horror ZombiU, updated gameplay and improved graphics allow you to get the best impression of the game Zombi - first person shooter genre survival horror. For the PC and next-generation consoles.

Features repack:
